MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML9 postcode area of Larkhall. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.20pm, this is to safely carry out repairs to an underground cable fault at Cadzow street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:10pm on Saturday, 14 November 2020.
